text: In the Heat of the Night is a 1967 American mystery drama movie directed by Norman Jewison. It is based on John Ball's 1965 novel of the same name. It is about a black police detective from Philadelphia, who becomes part of a murder investigation in a small town in Mississippi. It stars Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger. The movie won five Academy Awards, including for Best Picture and Rod Steiger for Best Actor. ==References== Category:American mystery movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Norman Jewison Category:Academy Award winning movies
